explains: vi. 向内破裂；内爆；崩溃

sentences.en: Will the mayor let the city's desperate health care system implode?
sentences.cn: 该市长是否会让这座城市的危机四伏的医疗体系就此崩溃呢？

sentences.en: Why do these couples seem to always implode?
sentences.cn: 为什么他们好像总是闹分手呢？

sentences.en: Use the implode function to turn that array of values into a comma-separated list.
sentences.cn: 使用implode函数将获得的数组转换为一个以逗号分隔的列表。
